archimate:TechnologyService.name: Overlord Leadership Service
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
https://druid.apache.org/docs/latest/operations/api-reference.html#get-13 GET /druid/indexer/v1/leader GET /druid/indexer/v1/isLeader
Requests are handled by the leader in a corum - they will be redirected to that leader if they submit to a non-leader
